contents: I'm August Valera, a second year studnet at UC Santa Cruz, California. I am interested in tech innovations, user interface and design, Android, front end development, and web. My hobbies include coding, watching anime, and participating in student government.
I graduated from Westmoor High School in Daly City, CA with class of 2013.
I am currently declared as a Computer Engineering (B.S) major under the Jack Baskins School of Enginnering at University of California, Santa Cruz. I am estimated to graduate in Spring of 2017.
